00042 IAEA_PhspSource::IAEA_PhspSource(const string &phsp_file,
00043                                  const string &Name, EGS_ObjectFactory *f) : EGS_BaseSource(Name,f) {
00044     init();
00045     openFile(phsp_file);
00046 }
00047 
00048 void IAEA_PhspSource::init() {
00049     otype = "IAEA_PhspSource";
00050     Xmin = -1e30;
00051     Xmax = 1e30;
00052     Ymin = -1e30;
00053     Ymax = 1e30;
00054     is_valid = false;
00055     mode2 = false;
00056     swap_bytes = false;
00057     the_file_name = "no file";
00058     filter_type = -1;
00059     particle_type = 2;
00060     description = "Invalid IAEA phase space source";
00061     Nread = 0;
00062     count = 0;
00063     Nrecycle = 0;
00064     Npos = 0;
00065     Nlast = 0;
00066     wmin = -1e30;
00067     wmax = 1e30;
00068     Nreuse_g = 1;
00069     Nreuse_e = 1;
00070     Nreuse = 1;
00071     Nuse = 2;
00072     first = true;
00073 }
00074 
00075 void IAEA_PhspSource::openFile(const string &phsp_file) {
00076     the_file_name = "no file";
00077     is_valid = false;
00078     int rwmode=1; //read only
00079     iaea_fileid=0; //this is just an array index for the iaea routines, not an actual
00080     //unit no., as in Fortran, so it can really be any integer value
00081     //not above MAX_NUM_SOURCES (30)
00082 
00083     //below is required because iaea opening routine gets file name as char array
00084     int len = phsp_file.length();
00085     char phsp_name_tmp[len+1];
00086     phsp_file.copy(phsp_name_tmp,len,0);
00087     //now put a null character on the end
00088     phsp_name_tmp[len]='\0';
00089 
00090     //use iaea function for opening phase space file
00091     iaea_new_source(&iaea_fileid,phsp_name_tmp,&rwmode,&iaea_iostat,len);
00092     if (iaea_iostat==105) {
00093         egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource::openFile: no header file name supplied.\n");
00094         return;
00095     }
00096     else if (iaea_iostat==-96) {
00097         egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource::openFile: failed to open header file %s.IAEAheader\n"
00098                    " for reading\n",phsp_file.c_str());
00099         return;
00100     }
00101     else if (iaea_iostat==-94) {
00102         egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource::openFile: failed to open phase space file %s.IAEAphsp\n"
00103                    " for reading\n",phsp_file.c_str());
00104         return;
00105     }
00106     else if (iaea_iostat==-1) {
00107         egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource::openFile: failed to initialize phase space source %s\n",phsp_file.c_str());
00108         return;
00109     }
00110     else if (iaea_iostat==-91) {
00111         egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource::openFile: failed to get record contents from header file %s.IAEAheader\n",phsp_file.c_str());
00112         return;
00113     }
00114     else if (iaea_iostat <0) {
00115         egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource::openFile: I/O error ocurred on opening phase space file %s\n",phsp_file.c_str());
00116         return;
00117     }
00118 
00119     //now check file size and byte order
00120 
00121     swap_bytes = false;
00122     iaea_check_file_size_byte_order(&iaea_fileid,&iaea_iostat);
00123     if (iaea_iostat==-1) {
00124         egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource::openFile: error reading file size/byte order from header %s.IAEAheader\n",phsp_file.c_str());
00125         return;
00126     }
00127     else if (iaea_iostat==-4) {
00128         egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource::openFile: byte mismatch between phase space file and machine.  Will swap bytes.\n");
00129         swap_bytes = true;
00130     }
00131     else if (iaea_iostat==-3 || iaea_iostat==-5) {
00132         egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource::openFile: mismatch between file size in header and actual file size of %s\n",phsp_file.c_str());
00133         return;
00134     }
00135 
00136     //now get some info from the header
00137     EGS_I64 n, n_photon, pinc;
00138     float emax, zposn;
00139     int iaea_type=-1; //for getting no. of particles
00140     iaea_get_max_particles(&iaea_fileid,&iaea_type,&n);
00141     if (n<0) {
00142         egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource::openFile: failed to get total no. of particles from %s.IAEAheader\n",phsp_file.c_str());
00143         return;
00144     }
00145     iaea_type=1; //for getting no. of photons
00146     iaea_get_max_particles(&iaea_fileid,&iaea_type,&n_photon);
00147     if (n_photon<0) {
00148         egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource::openFile: failed to get no. of photons from %s.IAEAheader\n",phsp_file.c_str());
00149         return;
00150     }
00151     //now get max. energy
00152     iaea_get_maximum_energy(&iaea_fileid,&emax);
00153     if (emax<0) {
00154         egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource::openFile: failed to get max. energy from %s.IAEAheader\n",phsp_file.c_str());
00155         return;
00156     }
00157     //no. of particles incident from original source
00158     iaea_get_total_original_particles(&iaea_fileid,&pinc);
00159     if (pinc<0) {
00160         egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource::openFile: failed to get no. of original particles from %s.IAEAheader\n",phsp_file.c_str());
00161         return;
00162     }
00163 
00164     //get number of extra float and extra long variables so we can set array dimensions
00165     iaea_get_extra_numbers(&iaea_fileid,&n_extra_floats,&n_extra_longs);
00166     if (n_extra_floats==-1 || n_extra_longs==-1) {
00167         egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource::openFile: failed to get no. of extra floats and longs stored in %s.IAEAphsp\n",phsp_file.c_str());
00168         return;
00169     }
00170     //determine if Zlast is stored in the file and, if so, its array index, i_zlast
00171     int extrafloat_types[n_extra_floats], extralong_types[n_extra_longs];
00172     iaea_get_type_extra_variables(&iaea_fileid,&iaea_iostat,extralong_types,extrafloat_types);
00173     if (iaea_iostat==-1) {
00174         egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource::openFile: failed to get Mode of data %s.IAEAheader\n",phsp_file.c_str());
00175         return;
00176     }
00177     mode2=false;
00178     for (int i=0; i< n_extra_floats; i++) {
00179         if (extrafloat_types[i]==3) {
00180             mode2=true;
00181             i_zlast=i;
00182             break;
00183         }
00184     }
00185 
00186     //determine array index of latch
00187     latch_stored=false;
00188     for (int i=0; i< n_extra_longs; i++) {
00189         if (extralong_types[i]==2) {
00190             latch_stored=true;
00191             i_latch=i;
00192             break;
00193         }
00194     }
00195     if (!latch_stored) {
00196         egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource::openFile: LATCH is not stored in data in %s.IAEAphsp\n",phsp_file.c_str());
00197     }
00198 
00199     Npos = 0;
00200     Nlast = n;
00201     Nfirst = 1;
00202     // at this point the position should be at the first particle in the file
00203     Emax = emax;
00204     Pinc = pinc;
00205     Nparticle = n;
00206     Nphoton = n_photon;
00207     is_valid = true;
00208     the_file_name = phsp_file;
00209 }
00210 
00211 IAEA_PhspSource::IAEA_PhspSource(EGS_Input *input, EGS_ObjectFactory *f) :
00212     EGS_BaseSource(input,f) {
00213     init();
00214     string fname;
00215     int err = input->getInput("iaea phase space file",fname);
00216     if (err) {
00217         egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource: no 'iaea phase space file' input\n");
00218         return;
00219     }
00220     openFile(fname);
00221     if (!isValid()) {
00222         egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource: errors while opening the phase space file"
00223                    " %s\n",fname.c_str());
00224         return;
00225     }
00226     vector<EGS_Float> cutout;
00227     err = input->getInput("cutout",cutout);
00228     if (!err && cutout.size() == 4) {
00229         setCutout(cutout[0],cutout[1],cutout[2],cutout[3]);
00230     }
00231     vector<string> ptype;
00232     ptype.push_back("electrons");
00233     ptype.push_back("photons");
00234     ptype.push_back("positrons");
00235     ptype.push_back("all");
00236     ptype.push_back("charged");
00237     particle_type = input->getInput("particle type",ptype,3)-1;
00238     vector<int> the_filter;
00239     vector<string> the_latch;
00240     err = input->getInput("filter type",the_filter);
00241     int err1 = input->getInput("latch setting",the_latch);
00242     if (!err && !err1) {
00243         if (the_filter[0] >= 0 && the_filter[0] <= 3) {
00244             int nbit1 = the_latch[0].size();
00245             int nbit2 = 0;
00246             if (!the_filter[0]) {
00247                 nbit2 = the_latch[1].size();
00248             }
00249             if (nbit1 + nbit2 > 0) {
00250                 int *the_bits = new int [nbit1+nbit2];
00251                 for (int j=0; j<nbit1+nbit2; j++) {
00252                     if (j < nbit1) {
00253                         the_bits[j]=(int)(the_latch[0][j] == '1');
00254                     }
00255                     else {
00256                         the_bits[j] = (int)(the_latch[1][j-nbit1] == '1');
00257                     }
00258                 }
00259                 setFilter(the_filter[0],nbit1,nbit2,the_bits);
00260                 delete [] the_bits;
00261             }
00262         }
00263     }
00264     vector<EGS_Float> wwindow;
00265     err = input->getInput("weight window",wwindow);
00266     if (!err && wwindow.size() == 2) {
00267         wmin = wwindow[0];
00268         wmax = wwindow[1];
00269     }
00270     int ntmp;
00271     err = input->getInput("reuse photons",ntmp);
00272     if (!err && ntmp > 0) {
00273         Nreuse_g = ntmp;
00274     }
00275     err = input->getInput("reuse electrons",ntmp);
00276     if (!err && ntmp > 0) {
00277         Nreuse_e = ntmp;
00278     }
00279     description = "IAEA phase space source from ";
00280     description += the_file_name;
00281 }
00282 
00283 EGS_I64 IAEA_PhspSource::getNextParticle(EGS_RandomGenerator *, int &q,
00284         int &latch, EGS_Float &E, EGS_Float &wt, EGS_Vector &x, EGS_Vector &u) {
00285     /*
00286     if( Nuse >= Nreuse ) {
00287         do { readParticle(); } while ( rejectParticle() );
00288     }
00289     */
00290     int nstat,extrainttemp[n_extra_longs];
00291     float extrafloattemp[n_extra_floats];
00292     if (Nuse >= Nreuse) {  //get a new particle
00293         if ((++Npos) > Nlast) {
00294             egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource::getNextParticle(): reached the end of the "
00295                        "phase space file chunk (%lld)\n  will start from the beginning "
00296                        "of the chunk (%lld) but this "
00297                        "implies that uncertainty estimates will be inaccurate\n",
00298                        Nlast,Nfirst);
00299             iaea_set_record(&iaea_fileid,&Nfirst,&iaea_iostat);
00300             if (iaea_iostat<0) {
00301                 egsFatal("IAEA_PhspSource::getNextParticle(): error restarting phase space chunk\n");
00302             }
00303             Nrecycle++;
00304             Npos = Nfirst;
00305         }
00306         iaea_get_particle(&iaea_fileid,&nstat,&p.q,&p.E,&p.wt,&p.x,&p.y,&p.z,&p.u,&p.v,&p.w,extrafloattemp,extrainttemp);
00307         ++Nread;
00308         if (latch_stored) {
00309             p.latch = extrainttemp[i_latch];
00310         }
00311         if (mode2) {
00312             p.zlast = extrafloattemp[i_zlast];
00313         }
00314         if (swap_bytes) {
00315             egsSwapBytes(&p.q);
00316             egsSwapBytes(&nstat);
00317             egsSwapBytes(&p.zlast);
00318             egsSwapBytes(&p.latch);
00319             egsSwapBytes(&p.E);
00320             egsSwapBytes(&p.wt);
00321             egsSwapBytes(&p.x);
00322             egsSwapBytes(&p.y);
00323             egsSwapBytes(&p.z);
00324             egsSwapBytes(&p.u);
00325             egsSwapBytes(&p.v);
00326             egsSwapBytes(&p.w);
00327         }
00328         //do check here because we need the swapped version of nstat
00329         if (nstat<0) {
00330             egsFatal("IAEA_PhspSource::getNextParticle(): error reading particle number %i\n",Npos);
00331         }
00332         //convert charge from iaea type
00333         if (p.q==1) {
00334             p.q=0;
00335         }
00336         else if (p.q==2) {
00337             p.q=-1;
00338         }
00339         else if (p.q==3) {
00340             p.q=1;
00341         }
00342         else {
00343             egsFatal("IAEA_PhspSource::getNextParticle: unknown charge on particle\n");
00344         }
00345         if (!latch_stored) {
00346             p.latch = 0;    //need some non-nonsense value in case there is a LATCH filter
00347         }
00348         //note: we don't have to convert to p.E to K.E. because that's what IAEA format stores
00349         if (first || nstat>0) {
00350             count++;    //increment primary history counter
00351         }
00352         first= false;
00353         //store Nreuse
00354         if (p.q) {
00355             Nreuse = Nreuse_e;
00356         }
00357         else {
00358             Nreuse = Nreuse_g;
00359         }
00360         //reset Nuse
00361         Nuse = 0;
00362         p.wt /= Nreuse;
00363     }
00364 
00365     //energy, wt, position and direction cosines
00366     x.x = p.x;
00367     x.y = p.y;
00368     x.z = p.z;
00369     u.x = p.u;
00370     u.y = p.v, u.z = p.w;
00371     wt=p.wt;
00372     if (rejectParticle()) {
00373         wt = 0;
00374     }
00375     E=p.E;
00376     q=p.q;
00377     //latch = 0;
00378     latch= p.latch;
00379     //rejectParticle uses BeamParticle, p
00380     ++Nuse;
00381     return count;
00382 }

00396 void IAEA_PhspSource::setSimulationChunk(EGS_I64 nstart, EGS_I64 nrun) {
00397     if (nstart < 0 || nrun < 1 || nstart + nrun > Nparticle) {
00398         egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource::setSimulationChunk(): illegal attempt "
00399                    "to set the simulation chunk between %lld and %lld ignored\n",
00400                    nstart+1,nstart+nrun);
00401         return;
00402     }
00403     Nfirst = nstart+1;
00404     Nlast = nstart + nrun;
00405     Npos = nstart;
00406     iaea_set_record(&iaea_fileid,&Nfirst,&iaea_iostat);
00407     if (iaea_iostat<0) {
00408         egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource::setSimulationChunk(): error setting phase space chunk\n");
00409         return;
00410     }
00411     egsInformation("IAEA_PhspSource: using phsp portion between %lld and %lld\n",
00412                    Nfirst,Nlast);
00413 }
00414 
00415 bool IAEA_PhspSource::rejectParticle() const {
00416     if (particle_type < 2 && p.q != particle_type) {
00417         return true;
00418     }
00419     if (particle_type == 3 && !p.q) {
00420         return true;
00421     }
00422     if (p.x < Xmin || p.x > Xmax || p.y < Ymin || p.y > Ymax) {
00423         return true;
00424     }
00425     if (p.wt < wmin || p.wt > wmax) {
00426         return true;
00427     }
00428     if (p.latch & 2147483648UL) {
00429         return true;
00430     }
00431     if (filter_type < 0) {
00432         return false;
00433     }
00434     if (filter_type == 1) {
00435         bool r1;
00436         if (filter1) {
00437             r1 = !(p.latch & filter1);
00438         }
00439         else {
00440             r1 = false;
00441         }
00442         bool r2 = (p.latch & filter2);
00443         return (r1 || r2);
00444     }
00445     if (filter_type == 1) {
00446         return (p.latch & filter1);
00447     }
00448     int l = p.latch >> 24;
00449     bool res = l & filter1;
00450     return filter_type == 3 ? res : !res;
00451 }
00452 
00453 void IAEA_PhspSource::setFilter(int type, int nbit1, int nbit2, const int *bits) {
00454     if (type < 0 || type > 3) {
00455         egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource::setFilter: invalid filter type %d\n",type);
00456         return;
00457     }
00458     int ntot = nbit1;
00459     if (type == 0) {
00460         ntot += nbit2;
00461     }
00462     if (ntot > 29) {
00463         egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource::setFilter: maximum number of bits is "
00464                    "limited to 29, you requested %d\n",ntot);
00465         return;
00466     }
00467     if (!ntot) {
00468         return;
00469     }
00470     filter_type = type;
00471     if (filter_type == 0) {
00472         int i;
00473         filter1 = 0;
00474         filter2 = 0;
00475         for (i=0; i<ntot; i++) {
00476             if (bits[i]) {
00477                 unsigned int aux = 1;
00478                 aux = (aux << i);
00479                 if (i < nbit1) {
00480                     filter1 += aux;
00481                 }
00482                 else {
00483                     filter2 += aux;
00484                 }
00485             }
00486         }
00487     }
00488     else if (filter_type == 1) {  // TODO
00489     }
00490     else if (filter_type == 2) {  // TODO
00491     }
00492     else if (filter_type == 3) {  // TODO
00493     }
00494 }

00500         return
00501             createSourceTemplate<IAEA_PhspSource>(input,f,"iaea phsp source");
